Package com.example.zephyr_lottery.utils

Class ValidationUtil

java.lang.Object
com.example.zephyr_lottery.utils.ValidationUtil
public class ValidationUtil extends Object
Utility class for validating user input Provides validation methods for email, phone, names, etc.
